start.title: A Pig Sets Out
start.text: Piggy Pig wakes one bright morning with an adventurous heart — today she will explore the wonders of Aotearoa (New Zealand)! Which way should she trot first?

farm1.title: Meadow of Gold
farm1.text: Piggy Pig trots through golden wheat fields. A calf stumbles toward her and children wave from the barn. The sky grows darker with distant thunder.

choices.label: Help the calf back to the barn

farm2_ribbon.title: Ribbons & Laughter
farm2_ribbon.text: Children giggle as they tie a bright red ribbon around Piggy Pig’s ears. The wind tugs at it playfully.

farm2_barn.title: Hay-Fort Kingdom
farm2_barn.text: Inside the barn, calves nestle in the straw. Piggy Pig nuzzles them, feeling warmth and belonging.

farm2_sky.title: Reading the Weather
farm2_sky.text: Piggy Pig watches clouds gather and birds swoop inland. Rain is on its way.

farm3_storm.title: Bruised Sky, Silver Rain
farm3_storm.text: Rain lashes the fields. Piggy Pig squeals in delight as droplets splash across her snout.

farm3_barn.title: Barn Heartbeat
farm3_barn.text: The barn glows warm with lantern light. Piggy Pig listens to the soft breath of calves.

farm4_porch.title: Lantern Porch
farm4_porch.text: Piggy Pig watches rain drip from the eaves. Lanterns swing, casting golden light.

farm5_hearth.title: Hearth of Little Suns
farm5_hearth.text: Farmers share hot tea and stories. Piggy Pig feels part of a bigger family.

farm5_kitchen.title: Mischief & Flour
farm5_kitchen.text: Piggy Pig knocks over a flour sack. Everyone laughs as a cloud of white fills the kitchen.

farm6_stories.title: Maps & Tales
farm6_stories.text: An old traveler spreads out maps of mountains, coasts, and forests.

choices.label: Follow the call of the sea

final_prep.title: Closing Moments
final_prep.text: After all her travels, Piggy Pig finally arrives at a mountain hut. It’s time for the feast reveal.
